job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description:
Working at Macro Solutions, a leading provider of IT and management consulting services, is an opportunity to collaborate with great people who have a passion for the services they provide to our clients. We are currently looking for a
ServiceNow Developer
to remotely join one of our long term Federal projects in Chantilly, VA . Macro Solutions offers flexible FTE, W2 hourly consultant and Corp to Corp terms.
Key Responsibilities
Has professional experience supporting ServiceNow configuration and development, requirements analysis, process execution and evaluation, and integration with other applications.
Interacts with customers and development team to gather and define requirements.
Analyzes and studies customer requirements to determine the most effective use of ServiceNow to satisfy their needs.
Designs, creates, tests, and maintains ServiceNow suites and modules to satisfy customer requirements.
Follows a formal design process using formal specifications, data flow diagrams, other accepted design techniques and also adheres to laws, standards, and established guidelines for development and delivery of ServiceNow capabilities.
Develops software using common commercially accepted programming languages (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, etc.) and data models (XML, JSON, CSV, etc.) as required.
Has administered ServiceNow instances including user creation, interfaces to AD, group creation and maintenance, group permissions, access control lists, global platform settings, notifications, and resource usage.
Configures ServiceNow to provide visually-pleasing, content rich, user-friendly interfaces with intuitive navigation.
Assists with developing and maintaining technical documentation to support maintenance and upgrades.
Provides software process management and configuration management throughout the ServiceNow development lifecycle.
Performs custom development and 3rd party integrations as required.
May provide day-to-day management of the technical team to develop, test, maintain, and support effective and efficient ServiceNow configurations.
Analyzes and troubleshoots complex software problems and provides solutions. Works independently on more complex projects.
Education + Experience:
Required ServiceNow Cert (Certified System Administrator or similar), and ITIL Foundation.
Desired DoD 8570 IAT II or greater.
BA/BS degree and 8 years of related work experience, or MS with 6 years.
Current Secret Clearance (or higher) preferred but not required.
Has implemented at least 3 ServiceNow modules and has a minimum of three years’ experience with ServiceNow.
Has experience with using and integrating solutions with large-scale relational databases.
Understands and knowledgeable in system development lifecycle methodologies.
Integrates new applications with the existing ServiceNow baseline to improve the functionality or design of the system.
Macro Solutions is a woman-owned IT and management consulting firm that helps government organizations select, implement, integrate and maintain critical business solutions. A relationship company at our core, we pride ourselves on building high-touch, high-trust environments for our clients and partners, at every level of our business. Assessed at CMMI Maturity Level 3 for both Development and Services and ISO 9001:2015 certification, Macro delivers honest, powerful results from the inside, outward.
Deeply invested in advancing long lasting employee relationships, our distinctive Consultant Care program ensures that our employees are always a priority at every level of the organization and has been integral to our 94% employee retention rate.
Along with a supportive environment and culture that thrives on dreaming big, getting things done and having fun together, Macro Solutions offers employees a full suite of competitive benefits, including health, dental, 401(k), and paid time off.
If you would like to learn more about Macro, are interested in joining our team, or would like to learn more about our Consultant Care program visit our website .
Macro Solutions is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
